(a) cricothyroidot- omy cannula (13G Ravussin™ type); (b) needle for cannula; (c) jet ventilator (Manujet™); (d) pressure gauge (0—4 bar); (e) pressure adjusting valve; (f) high pressure hose and Schrader valve; (g) tubing to connect ventilator to cannula.
